meanings.definition: A shape or design cut out of a material, such as paper or fabric.
meanings.sent1: She made beautiful cutouts of flowers for the art project.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed creating various cutouts for the classroom decoration.
meanings.sent3: The cutouts of animals seemed to come alive when placed on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she used cutouts to craft a stunning landscape.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cutouts added a festive touch to the party decor.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that has been cut out or removed from a larger piece.
meanings.sent1: He collected the cutouts from magazines to create a collage.
meanings.sent2: The detective carefully examined the cutouts from the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The cutouts of suspects made the investigation more intriguing.
meanings.sent4: Each cutout held a piece of the puzzle, revealing the hidden truth.
meanings.sent5: The missing cutout from the painting left a noticeable gap in the artwork.
